resources.string: Tenderheart strides in, defying stereotypes with a compassionate aura, a collection of herbs and healing salves at their side, their demeanor contradicting their intimidating appearance.

string-array.name: player_tenderheart
string-array.item: Hope your drink brings warmth after a day cloaked in mystery and arcane power.
Careful with that drink, it might just cast its own spells.
An enigmatic day, but maybe my company could add a touch of light?
